mapper.sql: id, status, createDate, account, lastModDate, password, userType, areaId, canTargetSchool
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_user_account ( status, createDate, account, lastModDate, password, userType, areaId, canTargetSchool ) VALUES ( #{status}, #{createDate}, #{account}, #{lastModDate}, #{password}, #{userType}, #{areaId}, #{canTargetSchool} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_user_account
status = #{status},
createDate = #{createDate},
account = #{account},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
password = #{password},
userType = #{userType},
areaId = #{areaId},
canTargetSchool = #{canTargetSchool},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_user_account
status = #{map.status},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
account = #{map.account},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
password = #{map.password},
userType = #{map.userType},
areaId = #{map.areaId},
canTargetSchool = #{map.canTargetSchool},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_user_account ( status, createDate, account, lastModDate, password, userType, areaId, canTargetSchool ) VALUES ( #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.account}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.password}, #{map.userType}, #{map.areaId}, #{map.canTargetSchool} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_user_account
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND account like CONCAT('%', #{account} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND password like CONCAT('%', #{password} , '%')
AND userType like CONCAT('%', #{userType} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{areaId} , '%')
AND canTargetSchool like CONCAT('%', #{canTargetSchool} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
